(I seem to be out of it today, in my post with Unitron "bombing" the bridge, 
I would like someone, preferably Iron Raptor, to post the damage.  And Liono, 
please post damage)

Smokescreen/Beachcomber/Sixshot/Anubis/Hades/Koga Shuko:



Smokescreen and Beachcomber came out of the CR room.  Spotting Rhinox, they 
stopped for a moment, seeing how damaged he and the bot he was carrying was.

"Hey, green guy, you get in a CR chamber too.  We're fresh and revived, so 
we're gonna kick some tailgate!" Smokescreen said, giving Beachcomber a "high 
five", heading for a hatch to leave the ship.

---

Anubis rolled, the force of the explosions and shots sending him rolling 
fast, slamming into a rock.  (By the way, Carnage and Crow Lord, Anubis is 
basically right behind Dinobot, so any rockets fired, the explosions would 
have a high chance of hitting Mr. Dinobot)

---

Sixshot brought up his targeting scanners, rolling out of the way of enemy 
fire.  Getting a lock, he fired six missiles off at the Ark, when flying 
above it, dropping two photon bombs towards the Ark.

---

Koga Shuko laughed at Liono's stupidity.  Raising his launcher, he fired a 
missile off at Liono, followed up by three optic blasts.
